h2_title: Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Final Bell
content: If you’re ready for a tough secret boss fight, you can enter the burned temple to face off against Elder Jinchi, and you can view strategies to defeat this boss here.

The content is as follows:
If you’re ready for a tough secret boss fight, you can enter the burned temple to face off against Elder Jinchi, and you can view strategies to defeat this boss here.
